hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base

Class Ref<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Ref<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the contained object

    public final class Ref<T>
extends Object
    A simple reference object holding something that can be changed. Not threadsafe and not ment to be.
    Author:
    akarnokd

    • Constructor Summary

      Ref()
      Initializes a null element.

      Initializes the ref with the given value.
